item.title: Monster kill count
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Well…
I just added a integer that counts the amount of npc’s you kill.
in player.java
int mKill;
this is the code im using to increase kill count.

						 			for(int k = 0; k < 10000; k++) {
				Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy];
				if(npcs[i].npcType == k) {	
				c.mKill++;
				}
			}

It’s set up in playersave.java
and in Client.java

And it shows the count in the quest tab.
Problem is that it resets back to 0 every time you relog, i don’t know what i’m doing wrong .__.

Read full topic
